divs: Sighting DetailsI left my house for a walk, I then heard children and adults commenting on what they saw in the sky, one of the children screamed ���Alien invasion!���, which obviously drew my attention so I also looked up at the sky. There in the sky I saw three orange lights, in a triangular formation. Whatever they were, they didn���t break this formation for 3 minutes. The lights were strong and they were solid, no blinking, and they were much larger than the stars I could see. They also moved faster than any of the airplanes (blinking lights) that were outside at that time. After 3 minutes, 2 of the lights went out, and then one turned back on, and off, and the other on and off. The UFOs then went in separate directions, and the lights all disappeared.
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Irvine
There were no other sightings in Irvine on or around June 21st 1995
Summary: 3 orange lights flying in formation over Orange County, CA.
